data.1: WOE TO THOSE who give short measure,
data.2: Who insist on being given full when they take from others,
data.3: Whilst when they measure or weigh for them, give less.
data.4: Do they not think they will be raised (to life) again
data.6: The day all mankind will stand before the Lord of all the worlds?
data.7: Indeed the ledger of the wicked will be in (the lowest depths) Sijjin.
data.8: How will you comprehend what Sijjin is?
data.9: It is a (repository of) distinctly written record.
data.10: Ah the woe that day for those who deny,
data.11: Who call the Day of judgement a lie!
data.12: None denies it but the sinful transgressors.
data.13: When Our revelations are recited before him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."
data.14: No. In fact what they have been doing has rusted their hearts.
data.15: Therefore they will be screened off from their Lord that day,
data.16: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.
data.17: They will then be told: "This is what you had denied."
data.18: Surely the ledger of the pious will be in ´Illiyun (heights above the heights).
data.19: But how will you comprehend what ´Illiyun is?
data.20: It is a (repository of) distinctly written record
data.21: Witnessed by those who are honoured.
data.22: Verily the pious will be in heaven,
data.24: On their faces you will see the glow of beatitude.
data.25: They will be served the choicest wine, sealed
data.26: With a sealing of musk, which those who aspire for the best should desire, --
data.27: Blended with the water of Tasnim, (heights ultimate of evolution),
data.28: A fountain from which only they who are honoured drink.
data.29: The sinners indeed laughed at believers
data.30: And winked at one another as they passed by them;
data.31: And when they went back to their people turned to make fun of them;
data.32: And when they saw them, they said: "They have indeed gone astray."
data.33: But they were not Sent to be guardians over them!
data.34: So, the believers will laugh at the infidels on that day,
data.35: Regarding them from their cushioned seats.
data.36: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?
